title: Daily Routine Verbs
reading_greek:
MORNING
- Ξυπνάω (I wake up - B)
- Πλένομαι (I wash myself - Passive)
- Τρώω πρωινό (I eat breakfast - A2)
- Πίνω καφέ (I drink coffee - A1)

DAY
- Πάω στη δουλειά (I go to work - A2)
- Δουλεύω (I work - A1)
- Γυρίζω σπίτι (I return home - A1)

NIGHT
- Μαγειρεύω (I cook - A1)
- Βλέπω τηλεόραση (I watch TV - A1)
- Κοιμάμαι (I sleep - Passive B)
reading_english:
VOCABULARY: ROUTINE

1. REFLEXIVE VERBS: 
   - 'Plenomai' means 'I wash myself'. 
   - 'Koimamai' means 'I sleep' (lit. I put myself to sleep).

2. COMMON PHRASES:
   - 'Ti ora xypnas?' (What time do you wake up?).
   - 'Ti ora gyrnas?' (What time do you return?).
audio_script:
Routine uses all the verb groups we learned. 

'Xypnao' (Group B) - Wake up.
'Plenomai' (Passive) - Wash.
'Troo' (Group A2) - Eat.
'Doulevo' (Group A1) - Work.
'Koimamai' (Passive) - Sleep.

A typical day:
'Xypnao, pino kafe, pao sti douleia, gyrizo, kai koimamai'.
(I wake up, drink coffee, go to work, return, and sleep).
